org.hps.recon.tracking

Class HoleCreationDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.recon.tracking.HoleCreationDriver

  • public class HoleCreationDriver
extends Driver
    Removes hits from selected layers of tracks. Writes new RawTrackerHits, HelicalTrackHits, RotatedHelicalTrackHits collections without these hits.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.lcsim.util.Driver

    • Constructor Detail

      • HoleCreationDriver

        public HoleCreationDriver()
        Default constructor. Pattern defaults to no holes. Random holes defaults to none.

      • HoleCreationDriver

        public HoleCreationDriver(boolean[] pattern,
                          int num)
        Parameters:
        pattern - : specifies layers in which to create holes. One boolean per layer, true=hole
        numRandom - : number of extra holes to put in random layers, on top of pattern
